summary: Personalized approach is important in the area of cancer treatment.  We constructed a data-warehouse which integrates 3 ontologies and 4 clinical databases semantically using Django's ORM. For the clinical use, a mobile web application was developed so that patients can get their personal pharmaceutical information about cancer therapy.
title: Biological Data Integration and Application for Personalized Cancer Treatment
